document_data.name: Snooki
document_data.mainbody: '''Snooki''' was a [[belabra]] who guarded the cottage belonging to the [[wizard]] [[Winterthur Redberry]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Snooki was highly protective of her children. She was also not intelligent enough to discern between friendly and unfriendly creatures, and she often attacked violently and unthinkingly.
document_data.Activities: Snooki acted as pet and guardian at the forest cottage of Winterthur Redberry, an elderly wizard. She was known to rest in his garden, disguised as a rock. She used her tentacles to hold trespassers in place.
document_data.History: After many years of service to Winterthur, Snooki gave birth to six baby belabras.
